name: Maze Complex
description:
Maze Complex is a survival game where the Survivors need to collect keys to escape but there is a Killer in the maze with them. Once all the keys have been collected the door to escape will unlock.

The maze is 100% procedural so the maze is never the same. Also the size will change based on amount of players when the game starts.

If you want to run a server you will need to PORT FORWARD.
